name: Endurance
description: You are able to push your body beyond its normal limits.
benefit: You gain a +4 bonus on several checks and saves related to resisting nonlethal damage and fatigue. You may also sleep in light or medium armor without becoming fatigued.

bonuses.condition: avoid nonlethal damage from a forced march
avoid nonlethal damage from starvation or thirst
avoid nonlethal damage from hot or cold environments

special: You may sleep in light or medium armor without becoming fatigued. A ranger automatically gains Endurance as a bonus feat at 3rd level.
